title: Did Tanzania’s President Expose Faulty COVID-19 Testing by Submitting Non-Human Samples?
subtitle: Viral social media posts claimed Tanzanian President John Magufuli used samples from a fruit, quail, and goat to uncover wrongful testing practices.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Tanzania President John Magufuli secretly sent specimens from a fruit, quail, and goat to a lab testing for the COVID-19 coronavirus disease in humans — and the results came back positive.
